title: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift- well etc
clause_text: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift- well etc. as covered under the provisions of DCR 31(1).
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Premium shall not be charged for exclusion of staircase and lift- well etc. as covered under the provisions of DCR 31(1).
